org.gbif.checklistbank.service.mybatis.guice

Class ChecklistBankServiceMyBatisModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.PrivateModule
      • org.gbif.service.guice.PrivateServiceModule
        • org.gbif.checklistbank.service.mybatis.guice.ChecklistBankServiceMyBatisModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.inject.Module

    public class ChecklistBankServiceMyBatisModule
extends org.gbif.service.guice.PrivateServiceModule
    Guice Module to use the database backed ChecklistBank MyBatis layer. To use this instantiate this module using one of the available constructors and provide the required properties. You need to provide at least a JDBC driver, URL, username and password for this to work. All properties have to be prefixed with checklistbank.db (e.g. checklistbank.db.JDBC.driver:
    • JDBC.driver
    • JDBC.url
    • JDBC.username
    • JDBC.password
    But you can also use any other properties that MyBatis understands (for example to configure BoneCP) as long as they have the proper prefix.
